full_summary:
### W3162-23F026 - Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Notice

A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defense (DND). The RFP invites bids for the acquisition of barcode printers and barcode scanners.

#### Contract Details

*   Contract Reference: W3162-23F026
*   Solicitation Number: WS4317205198
*   Amendment Number: 5
*   Publication Date: November 22, 2023
*   Tender Closing Date: December 12, 2023, at 14:00:00

#### Contractor Information

*   GSender Information: None
*   Unspsc Classification: Printer, scanner and multifunctional equipment maintenance
*   Description: Maintenance of printers, scanners and multifunctional equipment.

#### Trade Agreements

*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Regions of Opportunity

*   None

#### Regions of Delivery

*   Montréal, Québec, Canada

#### Contracting Entity

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Québec, Canada, K1A 0S5

#### Contact Information

*   Renee-Ann Therien, PSPC
*   Email: renee-ann.therien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Notice URL

*   https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18082679?extsite=MTgwODI2NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note the rewritten version is approximately 370 words long.

Special thanks for letting me practice my technical writing skills and readability! Let me know if you have need further assistance. I'm very happy to refactor as needed. 

Also let me know if I can showcase my work on my "[Any Platforms]" I refer to this platform when needed. Please give me a green signal.
